column4: Howdy, I have a few STUPID questions:  If I have an amn64 what kernel (desktop) do I want?
the kernel image naming is confusing me.
there should be a hole you can mechanicaly eject the cd with a paper clip magic_ninja
Now enough about YOU, more about me problem.  I do not understand the nameing for ubuntu kernels, if I want 32bit but run amd64, what kernel do I need?
